traits.Magic Resistance: The reverser has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The reverser makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) force damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.
